  width: var(--cell);

  background-color: aliceblue;
}
.game__cell--rock {
  background: #000038;
}
.game__cell--lava {
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, orange, #ff7d66 150%);
}

  position: relative;
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, #78d6c6 -50%, #fff 100%);
}
.game__cell--end {

}
